content.rendered:
Directed by Sukumar.

Written by Sukumar. Srinivas Rongali. Buchi Babu Sana. Kasi Vishal. Thota Srinivas. Srinivas Rongali. Buchi Babu Sana. Kasi Vishal. Palnati Surya Pratap.

Cast Ram Charan Teja(Chelluboina Chitti Babu). Samantha Ruth Prabhu(Rama Lakshmi). Aadhi(Chelluboina Kumar Babu). Jagapathi Babu(President Phanindra Bhupathi). V.K. Naresh(Koteswar Rao (as Naresh)). Prakash Raj(Dakshina Murthy). Anasuya Bharadwaj(Kolli Rangamma). Rohini(Kanthamma). Mahesh Achanta(Maisaa). Annie(Chittibabu’s sister). Banerjee(Dr. Sitaram (as Banerji)). Brahmaji(BDO Officer). Ajay Ghosh(Sheshu Naidu). Vajja Venkata Giridhar(Abbulu). Jeeva(Jeeram). Rajeev Kanakala(Venkat Rao). Pujita Ponnada(Padma). Satya(Veera Babu). Noel Sean(Erra Sreenu). Chandra Sekhar(Ganapathi). Shaking Seshu(Somaraju). Amit Sharma(Srimannarayana). Shatru(Kaasi). Pooja Hegde(a special appearance in the item number ‘Jigelu Rani’) .Aditya.Anil.Appu.Fm Babai.Sathi Babu.Suri Babu. Backagaindancer(Rehmaan).Basha.Bhaskar.Sai Bhuktha.Muni Chandra.Deva.Durgaji.Ganapathi.Gangadhar.Ghani.Gopal.Muralidhar Goud.Govind.Hari.Kaasulu.Kadambari Kiran.Kittayya.Krishnamurthy.Arun Kumar.Raj Kumar.Shiva Kumar.Vijay Kumar.Lakshmikanth. Padmaja Lanka(Mother).Maarkandeyulu.Naga Mahesh.Mallayya.Mallesh.Koru Mamidi.Ring Mani.Nageshwara Rao.Jogi Naidu.Lakshmi Narayana.Naveen Neni.Poojitha Ponnada.Shiva Prasad.Prithviraj.Puttayya.Rajshekar.Jogi Krishnam Raju.Ramakrishna.Sunkara Rangarao.Koteshwara Rao.Krishneshwar Rao.Muneshwara Rao.Narasimha Rao.Raghav Rao.Venkateshwara Rao.Josh Ravi.Ravindra.Katam Reddy.Malla Reddy.Narasimha Reddy.Srinivas Rudra.Pammi Sai.Sri Sai. Sathviksriram(Guest Apperance).Sharath.Shekhar.Shyamala.Siddha.Srikanth.Srinivas.Geddam Srinivas.Pappu Srinivas. Getup Srinu((as Getup Seenu)).Subramanyam.Sai Sudheer.Sundarayya.Pavan Suresh.Shiva Surya.Teja.Pavan Teja.Surya Varma.Veerendra.Venkatesh.Rao Venkateshwara.Vivek.Yaani.Swamy Naidu Yerubandhi

Language Telugu.

Producers Mohan Cherukuri. Chiranjeevi Pedamallu. Marpuri Praveen. V.Y. Praveenkumar. Y. Ravi Shankar. K.V.V. Bala Subramanyam. Naveen Yerneni.

Production Mythri Movie Makers.
